qc.notes: All required poses present; lighting/focus acceptable; minor occlusions not blocking key regions.

skin_type.label: combination
skin_type.rationale: The center of the face (nose/medial cheeks) shows visible pores and a slight natural sheen, while the sides look more matte. This points to oilier T-zone with relatively normal-to-dry cheeks. The pattern is consistent across angles.

skin_tone_fitzpatrick.label: IV
skin_tone_fitzpatrick.note: Estimated visually from medium-brown complexion under indoor light and dark hair/eyes. Exact skin reactivity to sun is not measured here.

skin_age_range.rationale: Fine lines are minimal, texture is mostly smooth, and pore prominence plus under-eye darkness align with early-30s skin. Camera angles and lighting can shift apparent age by a couple of years, so this is an estimate.

analysis.overview_explanation: Findings suggest a healthy combination skin with central pore visibility and mild cheek mottling. Under-eye darkness is the most noticeable contrast area but skin texture and lines are generally mild. No escalation features are seen in these images.

region_summary.summary_plain: Smooth and even with fine pores; only faint expression lines are detectable. Tone is uniform with subtle mottling.
possible_causes: Lower oil output here keeps pores fine.
Regular cleansing and sun protection help maintain even tone.

pores.evidence: Fine, small pores; no dense clusters.
pores.rationale_plain: Pores are small and mostly unnoticeable except very close up. Distribution is even without spread onto hairline.

wrinkles.evidence: Very faint horizontal lines only on strong brow movement.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: At rest, lines are minimal and short. This indicates low wrinkle prominence in this area.
possible_causes: Good hydration and sun care reduce visible lines.
Limited repetitive expressions while photos were taken.

pigmentation.evidence: Very light mottling; few tiny macules.
pigmentation.rationale_plain: Tone appears even with only faint scattered spots. Contrast is low.

redness.rationale_plain: The area looks calm without diffuse redness. Any color shift is faint.

texture.rationale_plain: Surface is smooth with only slight grain visible in bright light. No coarse roughness is seen.

acne.rationale_plain: Only a couple of small clogged pores are visible. No red or tender spots are present.
possible_causes: Normal turnover causing occasional blocked pores.

under_eye.evidence: Region not evaluated for under-eye here.
under_eye.rationale_plain: Under-eye scoring does not apply to the forehead.

region_summary.summary_plain: Clear skin with fine pores and no deep frown lines. Slight central redness near the bridge is noted.
possible_causes: Friction from touching or glasses can add redness.
Oil control is generally good here.

pores.rationale_plain: Pores are visible only at close range and are not clustered.

wrinkles.evidence: No prominent vertical '11' lines at rest.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: Lines are faint and short, appearing mainly with expression.

redness.evidence: Mild central redness near nasal bridge.
redness.rationale_plain: Color is slightly warmer centrally but not diffuse.

texture.rationale_plain: No coarse grain or flaking is seen.

acne.rationale_plain: Breakouts are essentially absent in this spot.

under_eye.rationale_plain: Under-eye scoring is not applicable here.

region_summary.summary_plain: Moderate under-eye darkening within the eyelid area; texture is smooth with faint fine lines. No redness or flaking.
possible_causes: Anatomical hollowing and genetics drive most of the contrast.

pores.rationale_plain: Skin under the eyes is fine-grained and shows minimal pores.
possible_causes: Thin skin here naturally has few visible pores.
Lower oil output in this zone.

wrinkles.evidence: Fine lines close to the lash line.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: Lines are short and shallow, typical for normal expressions.

pigmentation.rationale_plain: Contrast is present but not severe and stays within the lower lid.

redness.rationale_plain: Color looks calm without patchy redness.

possible_causes: Thin skin naturally shows fine texture.

acne.rationale_plain: Breakouts are not seen in this area.
possible_causes: Very low oil activity under the eyes.
Area is not prone to comedones.

under_eye.evidence: Visible darkening across the lower lid with slight hollow.
under_eye.rationale_plain: The lid appears darker than adjacent cheek, with a mild shadow from contour. Extent stays within the eyelid zone.

region_summary.summary_plain: Darkness similar to the left side with faint fine lines and smooth texture. No flaking or strong redness.

pores.rationale_plain: Under-eye skin lacks visible pores in normal photos.
possible_causes: Thin skin here has few visible pores.

wrinkles.evidence: Short fine lines near outer corner.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: Lines are mild and typical for age and expression.

acne.rationale_plain: No comedones or inflamed spots are visible.

under_eye.evidence: Darkening across lower lid similar to left; mild hollow.
under_eye.rationale_plain: Darkness is moderate and symmetric with confined extent.

region_summary.summary_plain: Moderate pores with fine surface grain and light mottling of tone. A tiny pink spot is present.
possible_causes: Sun exposure contributing to small spots.

pores.evidence: Noticeable pores on medial cheek near nose.
pores.rationale_plain: Pore openings are visible and more clustered near the center.

wrinkles.evidence: No persistent lines; only faint expression creases.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: Cheek skin stays smooth at rest.

pigmentation.rationale_plain: Contrast is moderate and limited to small areas.

texture.rationale_plain: Surface is not coarse but shows a visible micro-relief.

acne.evidence: Several comedones and one small pink papule.
acne.rationale_plain: Mostly non-inflamed clogged pores with a single mild inflamed spot.
possible_causes: Oil and sweat around mask or hands contact.

under_eye.evidence: Under-eye not evaluated in cheek region.

region_summary.summary_plain: Moderate medial-cheek pores and light mottling similar to the left. Texture shows fine grain.
possible_causes: T-zone adjacency and natural oil flow.

pores.evidence: Visible pores on inner cheek near nose.
pores.rationale_plain: Clustering appears near the center with fewer pores laterally.

pigmentation.rationale_plain: Tone is slightly uneven with small, discrete spots.

texture.evidence: Fine textural grain over medial cheek.
texture.rationale_plain: Texture is subtly uneven rather than coarse.

acne.evidence: Several comedones and one tiny pink papule.
acne.rationale_plain: Mostly non-inflamed comedones with a single mild inflamed spot.

under_eye.evidence: Under-eye not evaluated in cheek region.

region_summary.summary_plain: Pores are prominent with visible dotted blackheads. Mild central redness and a slightly coarser texture are present.
possible_causes: Higher oil output and pore density on the nose.
Touching or glasses pressure can increase redness.

pores.evidence: Medium, dense pores across bridge and tip.
pores.rationale_plain: Pore openings are clearly visible and widespread over the nose.
possible_causes: High sebum with larger pore structure.

wrinkles.rationale_plain: Nasal skin does not show wrinkle lines at rest.

pigmentation.evidence: Mostly even color with small freckles/dots from pores.
pigmentation.rationale_plain: Tone differences are minor; dots relate more to pores than pigment patches.

redness.evidence: Definite central redness on bridge and tip.
redness.rationale_plain: Color is warmer centrally compared to adjacent cheeks.

texture.rationale_plain: Texture looks rougher due to dense pores and comedones.

acne.evidence: Multiple open comedones; no inflamed papules.
acne.rationale_plain: Lesions are mainly blackheads without redness or swelling.

region_summary.summary_plain: Even tone and smooth texture with tiny pores only. No active blemishes are visible.
possible_causes: Lower oil output in this zone.

pores.rationale_plain: Pores are only faintly visible at close range.

wrinkles.evidence: No etched vertical lines at rest.
wrinkles.rationale_plain: Only subtle movement lines appear with expression.

pigmentation.rationale_plain: No strong contrast patches are seen.

acne.evidence: No inflamed spots; one tiny comedone at most.

region_summary.summary_plain: Small pores and even tone with a few tiny comedones. Texture remains smooth.
possible_causes: Occasional congestion from touch or masks.

pores.rationale_plain: Only small pore openings are visible.

wrinkles.rationale_plain: Skin is smooth without etched lines.

acne.evidence: Few tiny comedones; no inflamed spots.
possible_causes: Touching the chin or mask wear.
Oil buildup late in the day.

under_eye.rationale_plain: Under-eye scoring is not relevant here.

region_summary.summary_plain: Smooth skin with very fine pores and even tone. No active blemishes.
possible_causes: Low oil flow along the jaw.

acne.evidence: No active lesions; maybe one tiny comedone.

under_eye.rationale_plain: Under-eye metric does not apply here.

region_summary.summary_plain: Similar to the left jaw: fine pores, smooth surface, even tone. No active blemishes.

pores.rationale_plain: Pores are small and not clustered.

acne.evidence: No active lesions; possibly one tiny comedone.

scale.formula: Indices mapped from 1–5 scores using (score−1)/4×100; acne uses face-level class (3→50), under-eye is the side-average index.

limitations: Visual analysis only; no diagnoses or device colorimetry.
Indoor lighting and camera angles can change appearance of pores, redness, and tone.
Under-eye darkness influenced by anatomy and lighting; photos cannot separate these fully.
